#### 1. addi sp, sp, -16
Type: I-Type

Opcode: 0010011 (for addi)
rd: sp = x2 = 00010
funct3: 000
rs1: sp = x2 = 00010
imm[11:0]: -16 = 1111 1111 0000 (twoâ€™s complement)
Binary: 11111111000000010000000100010011
Hex: ff010113


2. li a1, 10
Type: I-Type

Opcode: 0010011
rd: a1 = x11 = 01011
funct3: 000
rs1: zero = x0 = 00000
imm[11:0]: 0000 0000 1010
Binary: 00000000001000000000010110010011
Hex: 00a00593


3. lui a0, 0x21
Type: U-Type

Opcode: 0110111 (for lui)
rd: a0 = x10 = 01010
imm[31:12]: 0x21 = 0000 0000 0000 0010 0001
Binary: 00000000000000100001010110110111
Hex: 00021537


4. ld ra, 8(sp)
Type: I-Type

Opcode: 0000011 (for ld)
funct3: 011
rd: ra = x1 = 00001
rs1: sp = x2 = 00010
imm[11:0]: 0000 0000 1000 (8 in binary)
Binary: 00000000010000001011000010000011
Hex: 00813083


5. auipc a2, 0x14
Type: U-Type

Opcode: 0010111
rd: a2 = x12 = 01100
imm[31:12]: 0x14 = 0000 0000 0000 0001 0100
Binary: 00000000000000010100001100010111
Hex: 00014617


6. sub a2, a2, a0
Type: R-Type

Opcode: 0110011
rd: a2 = x12 = 01100
funct3: 000
rs1: a2 = x12 = 01100
rs2: a0 = x10 = 01010
funct7: 0100000
Binary: 01000000101001100000001100110011
Hex: 40a60633

7. jal ra, 1036c <memset>
Type: J-Type

Opcode: 1101111
rd: ra = x1 = 00001
imm[20|10:1|11|19:12]: 254 = 0010 0101 0100
Binary: 00000010010101000000000011101111
Hex: 254000ef


8. auipc a0, 0x0
Type: U-Type

Opcode: 0010111
rd: a0 = x10 = 01010
imm[31:12]: 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000
Binary: 0000000000000000000001010010111
Hex: 00000517


9. lw a0, 0(sp)
Type: I-Type

Opcode: 0000011
rd: a0 = x10 = 01010
funct3: 010
rs1: sp = x2 = 00010
imm[11:0]: 0000 0000 0000
Binary: 00000000000000010010001000000011
Hex: 00012503


10. jal ra, 100b0 <main>
Type: J-Type

Opcode: 1101111
rd: ra = x1 = 00001
imm[20|10:1|11|19:12]: f79 = 1111 0111 1001
Binary: 11110111100100000000000011101111
Hex: f79ff0ef
